img.alt: Attention BC Warriors: Online Curriculum is here! Sack lunches available.

br.h2: BCSD Is Closed Through May 20th-Flex Learning will Continue

div.p:
BCSD SCHOOL UPDATE APRIL 20-24-CALLING ALL STUDENTS--WE NEED YOU TO BE ENGAGED IN YOUR LEARNING!!!
EDUCATION BCSD is closed through May 20th--the rest of the...
Tomorrow we will be starting our Flexible Learning Plan for this week. Bennett County High School, Middle School, and Martin Grade School have all materials on the school...
Bennett County High School senior Gage Jager will be featured as part of KEVN Black Hills FOX’s Rising Star of the West scholarship contest Friday March 27thon The SIX and...

BCSD students-we are in week 5 of FLEX learning. We need you to stay engaged!! Please pick up your new packets tomorrow and return last weeks. Let's show we are Warrior Strong in our learning! Contact your teacher if you need help!
We hope see everyone driving by the BC Football Stadium tonight to celebrate our first responders and seniors tonight. Lights will be on at 8:20 (Military time 20:20 for our Seniors)

Tomorrow night the BC Stadium will be lit up at 8:20 to celebrate first responders and seniors during this difficult time. We encourage everyone to approach from East School street by a Sod’s. This not parade line up, please come by and honk to show support when you can.

Thursday night at 8:20, the BC football field will be lit up to celebrate first responders and 2020 Seniors. Please drive by starting at Sod’s, and honk your horn to show recognition. Please social distance and stay in your cars. We hope to see and hear all of you!

​BCSD-Reminder- New packets will be available on Tuesday at the school buildings, following the same pick up schedules as the past week. When you pick up the new packet, please return last week's packet. Stay Engaged and Stay Safe!!
